latest.title: Change of Adviser
latest.content:
4 Nov 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 9985F
Chesterfield Resources PLC
04 November 2025
4 November 2025
Chesterfield Resources plc
("Chesterfield" or the "Company")
Appointment of Corporate Broker
Chesterfield Resources plc (LSE: CHF) is pleased to announce that AlbR Capital Limited has been appointed as Corporate Broker to the Company with immediate effect.
-ENDS-
Enquiries
Chesterfield Resources plc
Kashif Afzal, Executive Chairman
kashif@chesterfieldplc.com
AlbR Capital Limited
Corporate Broker
Lucy Williams/ Charles Goodfellow
+44 (0)20 7469 0930
